bug.author: PrathamSolanki
bug.description:
I'm trying to terminate running experiments/runs via the UI. When I do this it displays at the bottom that "Terminate succeeded for this run". However, the status of the run is still shown running. Also, is there a way to terminate experiments/runs via the command line? Right now I'm deleting individual pods using kubectl but it is not efficient. Environment:
Kubeflow version: 0.5.0 Kubernetes platform: gke Kubernetes version: 1.12.8-gke.10
